mapper.insert: insert into CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO (CUSTOM_ID, CUSTOM_ACCNT, CUSTOM_NAME, PASSWORD, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACK_TEL, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customAccnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contackTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO set CUSTOM_ACCNT = #{customAccnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOM_NAME = #{customName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACK_TEL = #{contackTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE} where CUSTOM_ID = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select CUSTOM_ID, CUSTOM_ACCNT, CUSTOM_NAME, PASSWORD, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACK_TEL, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE from CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO where CUSTOM_ID = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CUSTOM_ID, CUSTOM_ACCNT, CUSTOM_NAME, PASSWORD, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACK_TEL, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE from CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO
